author: The Irish Times
title: Driving and NCT tests suspended as Minister looks to extend validity
description: Shane Ross says people ‘need not worry’ but focus on abiding by coronavirus measures
content:
The Minister for Transport is looking at measurses to extend the validity of driver licences and NCT certificates as he announced the suspension of services.
Shane Ross and the Road Safety Authority RSA) confirmed on Saturday that the National Driver Licence… [+1500 chars]
